name: eldisjssd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(weldisj(c0), weldisj(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c0))
-| wi(wss(c1, c0), wi(weldisj(c0), weldisj(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(weldisj(c0), weldisj(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c0))
-| wi(wss(c1, c0), wi(weldisj(c0), weldisj(c1)))

|- wi(w0, wi(weldisj(c0), weldisj(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c0))

comment: Subclass theorem for disjoint elementhood, deduction version. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 28-Sep-2021.)
